dmca.title: Fraud site - www.personal-etrade.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Brandon Abbey [mailto:babbey@escrow.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 06, 2005 5:29 PM
To: sales@accupages.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com; ifcc33@ic3.gov;
la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov
Subject: Fraud site - www.personal-etrade.com 
Importance: High


It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.personal-etrade.com  I have
attached copies of this same fraud hosted by XO and Rackforce prior to their
removal.  Please disable this site immediately and thank you for your quick
attention to this matter.

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention that your company
provides services to a website, www.personal-etrade.com
<http://www.personal-etrade.com/>   which is infringing on Escrow.com's
intellectual property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com
(www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  This site claims to be
affiliated with our companies and has stolen content from Escrow.com.

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.personal-etrade.com <http://www.personal-etrade.com/>   site,
<http://personal-etrade.com/index.php?page=36>
http://personal-etrade.com/index.php?page=36  Neither Escrow.com nor IES has
any affiliation with www.personal-etrade.com
<http://www.personal-etrade.com/>  , and has a good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent or the law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.  

 

 
Brandon W. Abbey
Managing Director
Escrow.com
16275 Laguna Canyon Road
Irvine, CA  92618
Direct - 949-790-5880
Fax - 949-790-5811
